summary: A modders resource: Adds a forest-like throne to your level, castle, dungeon, etc.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][b] A modders resource [/b][/color]
Adds a forest-like throne to your level, castle, dungeon, etc.

[color=green][b] Usage [/b][/color]
The meshes and textures are set up for use in Skyrim; you may however use this in Oblivion or another game. Please just post proper credits or a link to the original mod.

[color=green][b] Extras [/b][/color]
Everything is ready to be dropped into your level as is. The file also comes with an optional .esp where you can view it in game or in Creation Kit ahead of time. The Throne is sitting at the top of Shadowgreen Cavern.

I also provided an .obj un-triangulated version if you want to make some tweaks in a 3d package.
author: Angilla
